Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER out of all Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE

Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
